title: [Gameplay] Kha'zix VO Bug
body: There's a bug with Kha'zix in which he will say any of his VO lines that require him to evolve his abilities to say without actually evolving said abilities. Kind of weird that Kha'zix will say "I will soar above them" when he doesn't have any wings yet :/

replies.body:
Heya WaluigiTheAnime! 

We actually changed how Kha'Zix's VO triggers several patches ago. This is working as intended.
